sentences: Fernando Tudela said a signal should be given to the markets on the future of the climate regime, and raised the possibility of a 'Montreal Mandate' at COP-11/MOP-1.
He suggested that further differentiation among developing countries was necessary, and introduced the idea of flexible convergence of per capita emissions.
While noting some positive aspects of the CDM, he listed various concerns, including transaction costs and an imbalance between environmental integrity and effectiveness.
